title: SOLD: T206 John Titus SGC 80 STEAL!!!
author: Gobucsmagic74

posts.post_title: SOLD: T206 John Titus SGC 80 STEAL!!!
posts.post_content: Beautiful card. MUST SELL. Asking SOLD via paypal f/f. This is a steal! First I'll take it takes precedence over on-going negotiation. Please pm me if interested
Bump and price drop. Great deal

There's been some inquiries as to why I'm selling this card after recently acquiring it from Kevin. Just want to make it clear that I'm not simply trying to flip it (not that there's anything wrong with that) but rather have an opportunity to pick up a pretty nice Wagner but need to come up with the funds by the end of the month. 

I have quite a few cards up for sale at the moment in various B/S/T threads and have already sold a 1951 Bowman Mantle RC in an attempt to come up with the funds necessary. If anyone would like to make an offer on this card, or any of my currently listed cards, please feel free.
Bump for fire sale. Must sell this weekend!! This is a steal
